qas.question: When did macaronic Latin start showing signs of Catalan?
When did texts begin to appear solely in Romance?
To what language did Catalan display similarities?
What Gallo-Romance language did Old Catalan separate from?

context: In the <a0_0>11th century<a0_0/>, documents written in macaronic Latin begin to show Catalan elements, with texts written almost completely in Romance appearing <a1_0>by 1080<a1_0/>. Old Catalan shared many features with <a2_0>Gallo-Romance<a2_0/>, diverging from <a3_0>Old Occitan<a3_0/> between the 11th and 14th centuries.
